channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: iPhone sales slump in China as Apple falters in key market
item.description: The company's overall sales in China declined 11.1% during the quarter to $18.51 billion.

item.title: We Must Stop the Middle-Class Tax Hike of 2026
item.description: Congress can prevent a looming rise in tax rates by making the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act permanent — all of it, this time.

item.title: Senate confirms Doug Burgum to head Interior Department
